trans-unit.source: PowerShell Desired State Configuration partial configurations
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Desired State Configuration 部分配置

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: 适用于：Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: In PowerShell 5.0, Desired State Configuration (DSC) allows configurations to be delivered in fragments and from multiple sources.
trans-unit.target: 在 PowerShell 5.0 中，Desired State Configuration (DSC) 允许从多个源中以片段形式提交配置。

trans-unit.source: The Local Configuration Manager (LCM) on the target node puts the fragments together before applying them as a single configuration.
trans-unit.target: 目标节点上的本地配置管理器 (LCM) 将碎片整理到一起，然后将其作为单个配置进行应用。

trans-unit.source: This capability allows sharing control of configuration between teams or individuals.
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许在团队或个人之间共享配置控制权。

trans-unit.source: For example, if two or more teams of developers are collaborating on a service, they might each want to create configurations to manage their part of the service.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果两个或更多开发人员团队协作提供一项服务，那么每个团队都可以创建配置来管理该服务中由其负责的部分。

trans-unit.source: Each of these configurations could be pulled from different pull servers, and they could be added at different stages of development.
trans-unit.target: 可以从不同请求服务器请求其中每个配置，并可以在各个开发阶段加入这些配置。

trans-unit.source: Partial configurations also allow different individuals or teams to control different aspects of configuring nodes without having to coordinate the editing of a single configuration document.
trans-unit.target: 部分配置还允许不同的个人或团队控制配置节点的不同方面，而无需协调单个配置文档的编辑。

trans-unit.source: For example, one team might be responsible for deploying a VM and operating system, while another team might deploy other applications and services on that VM.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能由一个团队负责部署 VM 和操作系统，而由另一个团队负责在该 VM 上部署其它应用程序和服务。

trans-unit.source: With partial configurations, each team can create its own configuration, without either of them being unnecessarily complicated.
trans-unit.target: 使用部分配置，每个团队都可以创建自己的配置，避免任何不必要的复杂配置。

trans-unit.source: You can use partial configurations in push mode, pull mode, or a combination of the two.
trans-unit.target: 可以在推送模式、请求模式或两种模式的组合下使用部分配置。

trans-unit.source: Partial configurations in push mode
trans-unit.target: 推送模式下的部分配置

trans-unit.source: To use partial configurations in push mode, you configure the LCM on the target node to receive the partial configurations.
trans-unit.target: 若要在推送模式下使用部分配置，你需要在目标节点上配置 LCM 以接收部分配置。

trans-unit.source: Each partial configuration must be pushed to the target by using the Publish-DSCConfiguration cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用 Publish-DSCConfiguration cmdlet 将每个部分配置推送到目标。

trans-unit.source: The target node then combines the partial configuration into a single configuration, and you can apply the configuration by calling the Start-DscConfiguration cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 然后，目标节点将部分配置组合成为单个配置。你可以通过调用 Start-DscConfiguration cmdlet 来应用配置。

trans-unit.source: Configuring the LCM for push-mode partial configurations
trans-unit.target: 针对推送模式部分配置来配置 LCM

trans-unit.source: To configure the LCM for partial configurations in push mode, you create a DSCLocalConfigurationManager configuration with one PartialConfiguration block for each partial configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要针对推送模式下的部分配置来配置 LCM，你可以为每个部分配置创建带有一个 PartialConfiguration 块的 DSCLocalConfigurationManager 配置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about configuring the LCM, see Windows Configuring the Local Configuration Manager.
trans-unit.target: 有关配置 LCM 的详细信息，请参阅 Windows 配置本地配置管理器。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an LCM configuration that expects two partial configurations—one that deploys the OS, and one that deploys and configures SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了需要两个部分配置的 LCM 配置：一个用于部署操作系统，另一个用于部署和配置 SharePoint。

trans-unit.source: The RefreshMode for each partial configuration is set to "Push".
trans-unit.target: 每个部分配置的 RefreshMode 都设置为“Push”。

trans-unit.source: The names of the PartialConfiguration blocks (in this case, "OSInstall" and "SharePointConfig") must match exactly the names of the configurations that are pushed to the target node.
trans-unit.target: PartialConfiguration 块的名称（在本例中即“OSInstall”和“SharePointConfig”）必须与推送到目标节点的配置名称完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: Publishing and starting push-mode partial configurations
trans-unit.target: 发布和启动推送模式部分配置

trans-unit.source: PartialConfig folder structure
trans-unit.target: PartialConfig 文件夹结构

trans-unit.source: You then call Publish-DSCConfiguration for each configuration, passing the folders that contain the configuration documents as the Path parameters.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以对每个配置调用 Publish-DSCConfiguration，将包含配置文档的文件夹作为 Path 参数进行传递。

trans-unit.source: After publishing both configurations, you can call `Start-DSCConfiguration –UseExisting` on the target node.
trans-unit.target: 发布两个配置后，即可在目标节点上调用 `Start-DSCConfiguration –UseExisting`。

trans-unit.source: Partial configurations in pull mode
trans-unit.target: 请求模式下的部分配置

trans-unit.source: Partial configurations can be pulled from one or more pull servers (for more information about pull servers, see Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration Pull Servers.
trans-unit.target: 可以从一个或多个请求服务器请求部分配置（有关请求服务器的详细信息，请参阅 Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration 请求服务器）。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you have to configure the LCM on the target node to pull the partial configurations, and name and locate the configuration documents properly on the pull servers.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，必须在要请求部分配置的目标节点上配置 LCM，并在请求服务器上正确命名和定位配置文档。

trans-unit.source: Configuring the LCM for pull node configurations
trans-unit.target: 针对请求节点配置来配置 LCM

trans-unit.source: To configure the LCM to pull partial configurations from a pull server, you define the pull server in either a ConfigurationRepositoryWeb (for an HTTP pull server) or ConfigurationRepositoryShare (for an SMB pull server) block.
trans-unit.target: 若要配置 LCM 以从请求服务器请求部分配置，你需要在 ConfigurationRepositoryWeb（适用于 HTTP 请求服务器）或者 ConfigurationRepositoryShare（适用于 SMB 请求服务器）块上定义请求服务器。

trans-unit.source: You then create PartialConfiguration blocks that refer to the pull server by using the ConfigurationSource property.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建 PartialConfiguration 块，这些块通过使用 ConfigurationSource 属性引用请求服务器。

trans-unit.source: You also need to create a Settings block to specify that the LCM uses pull mode, and to specify the ConfigurationID that the pull server and target node use to identify the configurations.
trans-unit.target: 你还需要创建用于指定 LCM 使用请求模式的 Settings 块，并指定请求服务器和目标节点用于识别配置的 ConfigurationID。

trans-unit.source: The following meta-configuration defines an HTTP pull server named CONTOSO-PullSrv and two partial configurations that use that pull server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的元配置定义了名为 CONTOSO-PullSrv 的 HTTP 请求服务器，以及使用该请求服务器的两个部分配置。

trans-unit.source: You can pull partial configurations from more than one pull server—you would just need to define each pull server, and then refer to the appropriate pull server in each PartialConfiguration block.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从多个请求服务器请求部分配置：定义每个请求服务器，然后在每个 PartialConfiguration 块中引用相应请求服务器即可。

trans-unit.source: After creating the meta-configuration, you must run it to create a configuration document (a MOF file), and then call Set-DscLocalConfigurationManager to configure the LCM.
trans-unit.target: 创建元配置后，必须运行该元配置以创建配置文档（MOF 文件），然后调用 Set-DscLocalConfigurationManager 以配置 LCM。

trans-unit.source: Naming and placing the configuration documents on the pull server
trans-unit.target: 在请求服务器上命名和放置配置文档

trans-unit.source: The partial configuration documents must be placed in the folder specified as the ConfigurationPath in the `web.config` file for the pull server (typically `C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration`).
trans-unit.target: 必须将部分配置文档置于请求服务器的 `web.config` 文件中指定为 ConfigurationPath 的文件夹中（通常为 `C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\DscService\Configuration`）。

trans-unit.source: The configuration documents must be named as follows: ConfigurationName.
trans-unit.target: 必须将配置文档命名如下：ConfigurationName。

trans-unit.source: ConfigurationID`.mof`, where ConfigurationName is the name of the partial configuration and ConfigurationID is the configuration ID defined in the LCM on the target node.
trans-unit.target: ConfigurationID`.mof`，其中 ConfigurationName 是部分配置的名称，ConfigurationID 是目标节点上 LCM 中定义的配置 ID。

trans-unit.source: Running partial configurations from a pull server
trans-unit.target: 从请求服务器上运行部分配置

trans-unit.source: After the LCM on the target node has been configured, and the configuration documents have been created and properly named on the pull server, the target node will pull the partial configurations, combine them, and apply the resulting configuration at regular intervals as specified by the RefreshFrequencyMins property of the LCM.
trans-unit.target: 在目标节点上配置 LCM，并在请求服务器上正确创建和命名配置文档后，目标节点将请求并合并部分配置，然后按照由 LCM 的 RefreshFrequencyMins 属性指定的固定时间间隔应用生成的配置。

trans-unit.source: If you want to force a refresh, you can call the Update-DscConfiguration cmdlet, to pull the configurations, and then `Start-DSCConfiguration –UseExisting` to apply them.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想强制进行刷新，可以调用 Update-DscConfiguration cmdlet 以请求配置，然后调用 `Start-DSCConfiguration –UseExisting` 以应用这些配置。

trans-unit.source: Partial configurations in mixed push and pull modes
trans-unit.target: 推送与请求混合模式下的部分配置

trans-unit.source: You can also mix push and pull modes for partial configurations.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以混用推送和请求模式以进行部分配置。

trans-unit.source: That is, you could have one partial configuration that is pulled from a pull server, while another partial configuration is pushed.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，你可以同时拥有一个从请求服务器请求的部分配置和另一个推送的部分配置。

trans-unit.source: Treat each partial configuration as you would, depending on its refresh mode as described in the previous sections.
trans-unit.target: 根据上文各节中所述的配置刷新模式，使用需要的部分配置。

trans-unit.source: Note that the RefreshMode specified in the Settings block is "Pull", but the RefreshMode for the OSInstall partial configuration is "Push".
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Settings 块中指定的 RefreshMode 为“Pull”，而 OSInstall 部分配置中的 RefreshMode 为“Push”。

trans-unit.source: You would name and locate the configuration documents as described above for their respective refresh modes.
trans-unit.target: 可按照上文所述的相应刷新模式命名和放置配置文档。

trans-unit.source: You would call Publish-DSCConfiguration to publish the SharePointInstall partial configuration, and either wait for the OSInstall configuration to be pulled from the pull server, or force a refresh by calling Update-DscConfiguration.
trans-unit.target: 可调用 Publish-DSCConfiguration 来发布 SharePointInstall 部分配置，并等待从请求服务器请求 OSInstall 配置或通过调用 Update-DscConfiguration 强制进行刷新。
